accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the system.

completeness.description: The extent to which the response addresses all aspects of the question.

efficiency.description: The amount of computational resources and time taken to achieve the task.

reasoning_depth.description: The level of complexity and depth of the system's reasoning process.

steps_required.description: The number of steps or actions taken by the agents to answer the question.

solution_traceability.description: The ability to follow and understand the reasoning trace of the solution process.

use_of_external_resources.description: The extent to which the system utilizes external resources to derive the answer.

adaptability.description: The system's ability to handle a wide range of questions and adapt to new information.

error_recovery.description: The system's ability to recognize and correct its own errors during the problem-solving process.

collaboration_effectiveness.description: How effectively the different agents work together to achieve the task.

data_contamination_prevention.description: The system's ability to prevent data contamination, i.e., not using incorrect or biased information.
